text: Gisele Barreto Fetterman (n√©e Almeida; born February 27, 1982) is a Brazilian- American activist, philanthropist, and nonprofit executive. She is a founder of the non-profit Freestore 15104. She is a co-founder of the non-profits For Good Pgh and 412 Food Rescue. She is the wife of Lieutenant-Governor John Fetterman. She is the Second Lady of Pennsylvania. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1982 births Category:American political activists Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Businesspeople from Pennsylvania Category:Philanthropists from Pennsylvania Category:Brazilian activists Category:Businesspeople from Rio de Janeiro
title: Gisele Barreto Fetterman
